pitrou commented on pull request #6446: ARROW-7664: [C++] Rework FileSystemFromUri
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6446
 
 
   FileSystemFromUri now recognizes only URIs. 
   An additional function FileSystemFromUriOrPath also recognized absolute local paths (but not relative paths).

bkietz commented on pull request #6446: ARROW-7664: [C++] Rework FileSystemFromUri
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6446#discussion_r380792029
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/arrow/filesystem/filesystem.cc
 ##########
 @@ -359,20 +360,31 @@ struct FileSystemUri {
 
 Result<FileSystemUri> ParseFileSystemUri(const std::string& uri_string) {
   FileSystemUri fsuri;
-  RETURN_NOT_OK(fsuri.uri.Parse(uri_string));
+  auto status = fsuri.uri.Parse(uri_string);
+  if (!status.ok()) {
+#ifdef _WIN32
+    // Could be a "file:..." URI with backslashes instead of regular slashes.
 
 Review comment:
   Perhaps this fallback should only be used when `uri_string.starts_with("file:")`; backslashes may mean something else for other schemes
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the

   FileSystemUri fsuri;
-  RETURN_NOT_OK(fsuri.uri.Parse(uri_string));
+  auto status = fsuri.uri.Parse(uri_string);

+#ifdef _WIN32
